Package util

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DirExplorer.FileHandler
    An interface for handling source files.
    DirExplorer.Filter
    An interface to limit handled files in project directory to source files only.
    NodeIterator.NodeHandler  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AllMetricsFileHandler
    A node handler that instantiates and applies ALL metrics to each source file.
    DirExplorer
    Defines methods and interfaces to assist in project directory traversal.
    JavaFilter
    An implementation of Filter interface.
    NodeIterator
    An iterator that implements input project's directory exploration (recursive tree traversal).
    SingleMetricFileHandler
    A node handler that instantiates and applies a single metric to each source file.
